title: Expose All 3 Albums
description:
I&#039;ve been a big fan of Expose since I first heard them back in the late 1980&#039;s.  These oldies but goodies are hard to find on the net.  I thought I&#039;d give back to the Pirate Bay Community by seeding all three of Expose&#039;s Albums.  I hope this helps some of you who have been searching for their music.

Exposure (1987)

1. Come Go With Me 	
2. Let Me Be The One 	
3. Exposed to Love 	
4. Seasons Change 	
5. Extra Extra 	
6. Point of No Return 	
7. Love Is Our Destiny	
8. I Know You Know 	
9. You&#039;re The One I Need 	
10. December


What You Don&#039;t Know (1989)
 	
1. What You Don&#039;t Know 	
2. Stop, Listen, Look & Think 	
3. Tell Me Why
4. When I Looked at Him
5. Let Me Down Easy
6. Still Hung Up on You
7. Your Baby Never Looked Good in Blue
8. Now That I Found You
9. Love Don&#039;t Hurt
10. Didn&#039;t It Hurt To Hurt Me
11. Walk Along With Me
12. What You Don&#039;t Know (In Effect Mix)
13. When I Looked at Him "Suave Mix" (Acoustic Version)


Expose (1992)

1. I Think I&#039;m in Trouble
2. You Don&#039;t Know What You Got
3. I Wish The Phone Would Ring
4. As Long As I Can Dream
5. In Walked Love
6. I&#039;ll Never Get Over You Getting Over Me
7. Angel
8. Face to Face
9. I Specialize In Love
10. Touch and Go
